He's he's being a little bit modest because [laughter] he he does care deeply about the action and he actually flew out the same day as me so that he could have a prep day and Lewis actually came out for those two days which I'm I'm grateful for because Lewis's um you know action um prowess is very knowledgeable >> and so it was able to just merge together quite a few different elements from the action, comedy, world building, character work that in the end I I thought like was worked surprisingly well. It was much better than I was expecting it to be. Another big part of the movie is that Kate Beckinsale's brother just because of things in their past is is a very broken person that leads to a lot of chaos around him. And a lot of the trouble in the film comes from that, his destructive tendencies. And on the one hand, that's kind of one of the emotional anchors of the film that elevates it that it is a little bit more character-driven, but it goes so far with just how broken he is. It makes him a very irritating and frustrating character because in every situation he just makes it so much worse because he's there that it it's just whenever he's on screen you're like what is he going to do this time and that's you're supposed to feel that way but I think it does go so far that it it makes for a like unpleasantness. If you like

entities.entity_description: Kate Beckinsale는 영화에 출연한 배우로, 그녀의 캐릭터에게는 과거의 일로 인해 매우 상처받은 형제가 있다
Lewis는 액션 분야에 대한 전문 지식이 풍부한 스태프로, 촬영 준비를 위해 이틀간 현장에 참여했다
Kate Beckinsale 캐릭터의 형제로, 과거의 일로 인해 매우 상처받은 인물이며 파괴적인 성향으로 영화 내에서 많은 혼란과 문제를 일으키는 캐릭터이다. 영화의 감정적 앵커 역할을 하지만 너무 극단적으로 묘사되어 짜증나고 불쾌한 캐릭터가 되기도 한다

relationships.relationship_description: Kate Beckinsale이 연기하는 캐릭터의 형제 관계이다
Lewis는 Kate Beckinsale이 출연한 영화의 액션 장면 준비에 참여했다
